entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:01 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rosetown Airport 07:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
